site index



















Professional Education is a more flexible way to go to college and advance your career. Courses are available
                           on campus, off-campus, online and during academic gap periods. All courses are taught
                           by SJSU faculty for college credit. Courses are available through the following programs:
Academic Programs: Earn a graduate degree or certificate to advance your professional career while continuing
                           to work.
Open University: Disqualified SJSU students and the general community interested in taking college
                           courses may enroll.
Winter Session: Earn up to 4 units in 2 weeks on campus or online to lighten your spring course load.
Summer Session: Take 5 to 10-week courses on campus or online to get ahead or catch up on classes
                           you need.
CEU Professional Development: Partner with SJSU to help students from a variety of professions meet their industry's
                           continuing education requirements.
